name: Codename Nemesis
description:
Codename Nemesis is an indie, top down, action RPG set in a Noir themed world with cult action-movie styled cinematic and graphics straight out of the early 90's era.

Follow the story of Sam, a small time hired hit who gets framed alongside his colleague Neil for the assassination of their boss, a powerful crime-lord. With every goon in the city wanting both of them dead, Sam takes upon this journey to find Neil to keep him from harm's way and eventually face his ultimate nemesis.

Key Features:
  • Immersive Story-line.
  • Movie styled in game cut-scenes with cheesy dialogues.
  • Striking, Old 90's video games styled graphical extravaganza.
  • 70's era urban themed RPG environment.
